translated: Pairs of Elements🔽The Chapter on Assigning Names
. The Chapter on Assigning Names: Outline
Homage to that Blessed One, the Worthy One, the Rightly Self-awakened One.

original: Aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo—cakkhudhātu, sotadhātu, ghānadhātu, jivhādhātu, kāyadhātu, rūpadhātu,
analyzed: aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo cakkhu dhātu sota dhātu ghāna dhātu jivhā dhātu kāya dhātu rūpa dhātu
translated: There are eighteen elements: the eye element, the ear element, the nose element, the tongue element, the body element, the form element,

original: saddadhātu, gandhadhātu, rasadhātu, phoṭṭhabbadhātu, cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, sotaviññāṇadhātu,
analyzed: sadda dhātu gandha dhātu rasa dhātu phoṭṭhabba dhātu cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu sota viññāṇa dhātu
translated: the sound element, the odour element, the flavour element, the tangible element, the eye-consciousness element, the ear-consciousness element,

original: ghānaviññāṇadhātu, jivhāviññāṇadhātu, kāyaviññāṇadhātu, manodhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu, dhammadhātu.
analyzed: ghāna viññāṇa dhātu jivhā viññāṇa dhātu kāya viññāṇa dhātu manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu dhamma dhātu
translated: the nose-consciousness element, the tongue-consciousness element, the body-consciousness element, the mind element, the mind-consciousness element, the mental-data element.
. The Chapter on Tracking Down Terms
. The Direct Way🔽Is the eye the eye element?

analyzed: cakkhu dhātu cakkhu  sotam sota dhātu
translated: Is the eye element the eye?🔽Is the ear the ear element?

analyzed: sota dhātu sota pe  cakkhu viññāṇam cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu
translated: Is the ear element the ear? …🔽Is eye-consciousness eye-consciousness element?

analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu cakkhu viññāṇa pe  manaḥ manaḥ dhātu
translated: Is the eye-consciousness element eye-consciousness? …🔽Is the mind the mind element?

analyzed: manaḥ dhātu mano  manaḥ viññāṇam manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu
translated: Is the mind element the mind?🔽Is mind-consciousness mind-consciousness element?

analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa  dhammaḥ dhammadhātu
translated: Is the mind-consciousness element mind-consciousness?🔽Is an idea the mental-data element?
Is the mental-data element an idea?🔽.

analyzed: paccanīka  na cakkhu na cakkhu dhātu
translated: 4.1.1.1.2. Reverse order🔽Is the eye not the eye element?

original: Na cakkhudhātu na cakkhu?🔽Na sotaṁ na sotadhātu?
analyzed: na cakkhu dhātu na cakkhu  na sotam na sota dhātu
translated: Is the eye element not the eye?🔽Is the ear not the ear element?

analyzed: na sota dhātu na sota pe
translated: Is the ear element not the ear? …

analyzed: na cakkhu viññāṇam na cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu
translated: Is eye-consciousness not the eye-consciousness element?

original: Na cakkhuviññāṇadhātu na cakkhuviññāṇaṁ? …pe…🔽Na mano na manodhātu?
analyzed: na cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu na cakkhu viññāṇa pe  na manaḥ na manaḥ dhātu
translated: Is the eye-consciousness element not eye-consciousness? …🔽Is the mind not the mind element?

original: Na manodhātu na mano?🔽Na manoviññāṇaṁ na manoviññāṇadhātu?🔽Na manoviññāṇadhātu na manoviññāṇaṁ?
analyzed: na manaḥ dhātu na manaḥ  na manaḥ viññāṇam na manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu  na manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu na manaḥ viññāṇa
translated: Is the mind element not the mind?🔽Is mind-consciousness not the mind-consciousness element?🔽Is the mind-consciousness element not mind-consciousness?
Is mind-object not the mind-object element?
Is the mind-object element not mind-object?

Is the eye the eye element?

original: Dhātū dhammadhātu?🔽(Yathā āyatanayamake cakkaṁ bandhitaṁ evamidha cakkaṁ bandhitabbaṁ.)
analyzed: dhātū dhammadhātu  yathā āyatana yamake cakkam bandhitam evam idha cakkam bandhitabba
translated: Are the elements the mind-object element?🔽(Just as the wheel is constructed in the case of the bases, so too the wheel should be constructed here.)
..... Reverse order

original: Na cakkhu na cakkhudhātu?🔽Na dhātū na sotadhātu?
analyzed: na cakkhu na cakkhu dhātu  na dhātū na sotadhātu
translated: Is the eye not the eye element?🔽Are the elements not the ear element?
Is the eye not the eye element?

analyzed: na dhātū na gha an adhātu pe
translated: Are the elements not the nose element? …
Is the eye not an element?

original: Na dhātū na cakkhudhātu? …pe…🔽Na dhammo na dhammadhātu?
analyzed: na dhātū na cakkhu dhātu pe  na dhammaḥ na dhammadhātu

The Section on the Pure Elements
The Direct Order🔽Is the eye an element?
Are the elements the eye?🔽Is the ear an element?
Are the elements the ear?

original: Ghānaṁ dhātu? …pe… Jivhā dhātu? … Kāyo dhātu? … Rūpaṁ dhātu? … Saddo dhātu? … Gandho dhātu? … Raso dhātu? … Phoṭṭhabbo dhātu? …🔽Cakkhuviññāṇaṁ dhātu?

translated: Is the nose an element? … Is the tongue an element? … Is the body an element? … Is form an element? … Is sound an element? … Is smell an element? … Is taste an element? … Is tangibility an element? …🔽Is eye-consciousness an element?

analyzed: dhātū cakkhu viññāṇa  sota viññāṇam dhātu
translated: Are the elements eye-consciousness?🔽Is ear-consciousness an element?
Are the elements ear-consciousness?

analyzed: ghāna viññāṇa pe jivhā viññāṇa kāya viññāṇa
translated: … Is nose-consciousness an element? … Is tongue-consciousness an element? … Is body-consciousness an element?

analyzed: manaḥ dhātu  dhātū mano  manaḥ viññāṇam dhātu
translated: Is the mind an element?🔽Are the elements the mind?🔽Is mind-consciousness an element?

The Reverse Order🔽Is the eye not an element?

original: … Na ghānaṁ? … Na jivhā? … Na kāyo? … Na rūpaṁ? … Na saddo? … Na gandho? … Na raso? … Na phoṭṭhabbo?🔽Na cakkhuviññāṇaṁ na dhātu?
